summary: Computer repair & sale or service application

existing_features.title: Create a service listing page displaying available computer repair services with descriptions and pricing
Create a product catalog page for computer sales showing available computers and parts with specifications and prices
Implement a service request form where customers can submit repair requests with device details and issue description
Design a professional, tech-focused visual theme with a modern layout emphasizing trust and technical expertise, using a color palette of slate grays, electric greens, and crisp whites
Render generated brand images including a tech-themed logo and hero background as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated

Update the application name displayed in the header navigation to 'TestAut'. The change should apply to the link element and span element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/a[1] and /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/a[1]/span[1], which correspond to the logo/brand name in the Layout component.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend data model to store service requests, repair services, and products for sale
